content: With the Boshan Censer equipped, it grants considerable damage reduction when Gourd use is depleted. So, if you are someone who hasn't upgraded their Gourd or is running a Gourd with a low amount of uses, this can be incredibly powerful, granting you enhanced survivability for an extended period. Dodge masters and those using Cloud Step and Rock Solid can really benefit from this Curios item.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Boshan_Censer.md', within the main section titled 'Boshan Censer'.
The content is as follows:
With the Boshan Censer equipped, it grants considerable damage reduction when Gourd use is depleted. So, if you are someone who hasn't upgraded their Gourd or is running a Gourd with a low amount of uses, this can be incredibly powerful, granting you enhanced survivability for an extended period. Dodge masters and those using Cloud Step and Rock Solid can really benefit from this Curios item.
